mapper.select: SELECT noJurnal FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i_journo_doc as noJurnal FROM tmjourskpd order by i_journo_doc ) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}
SELECT count(*) as banyak FROM ( SELECT distinct i_journo_doc as noJurnal from tmjourumumskpd where i_idskpd= #{idskpd} order by i_journo_doc )
SELECT noJurnal FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT distinct i_journo_doc as noJurnal from tmjourumumskpd order by i_journo_doc ) a) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} AND rn > #{offset}
